thread.title: OpsHub Announces Reseller Agreement with Rally to Drive Business Agility
thread.title_full: OpsHub Announces Reseller Agreement with Rally to Drive Business Agility - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: OpsHub Announces Reseller Agreement with Rally to Drive Business Agility
text:
Rally customers can leverage OpsHub integration hub and enterprise class connectors to unify complex ALM ecosystems
Palo Alto, CA (PRWEB) October 12, 2015
OpsHub, a leading provider of Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) integration solutions, is pleased to announce a reseller agreement with Rally, now a part of CA Technologies and a leading global provider of enterprise-class software and services solutions to drive business agility. This partnership will enable Rally to sell OpsHub’s ALM integration and migration solution to its global customers.
By leveraging OpsHub's integration solution, users of the Rally platform will have access to more than 40 third-party, best-of-breed ALM systems. Users can see third-party data from within Rally in real-time, synchronize and map artifacts across the lifecycle, and make cross-tool system traceability and reporting accessible to all Rally stakeholders.
“Large enterprises have complex environments, often involving many third-party systems,” said Ryan Polk, vice president of product management, Rally. “The OpsHub ALM integrations solution, with its enterprise-grade features, will further enable our customers to achieve a unified ALM ecosystem, resulting in faster development cycles, better quality products and higher customer satisfaction.”
“Our partnership with Rally brings an agile, enterprise ready, ALM integration solution with support for over 40 third-party best-of-breed systems to Rally customers,” said Sandeep Jain, president and CEO of OpsHub. “Leveraging the OpsHub solution, they can now seamlessly collaborate with their colleagues using third-party systems from within Rally, increasing business agility.”
About OpsHub
OpsHub is the leading provider of Application Lifecycle Management (ALM) integration and migration solutions for application development organizations. OpsHub creates a unified ALM ecosystem by seamlessly combining individual ALM systems, enabling agility at scale. The OpsHub solution provides the most comprehensive out-of-the-box integration and migration solution within the ALM ecosystem. Its span across ALM functionality includes requirements management, source control, bug tracking, test management, release management and customer support.
The OpsHub solution enables quick migration and seamless integration between leading ALM systems including those from HP, Microsoft, IBM, Accept, Atlassian, Rally, Serena, and more. OpsHub delivers their on premise and cloud-based solutions to enterprises around the globe. For more information, visit http://www.opshub.com
All trademarks and trade names belong to their respective companies.
